name: Hill Dismount - Smash the Fruits
description:
Driving various transport and getting into different real crash in Hill Dismount, the best physics based crashing and smashing game on Android!

Hill Dismount lets you assume the role of an inadequately prepared racer and you are not allowed to stop! Drive as fast as possible, perform death-defying stunts, smash all the fruits on the road in a desperate search for victory!

Game Features:
- Dozens of vehicles: bikes, cars, trucks, shopping carts, wheelchairs …
- Deadly obstacles including spikes, mines, iron balls, harpoons & etc.
- 40+ real physics-based challenging levels and more to come
